designations.source: A review of the Non-Marine Mollusca of Great Britain
designations.source_description: A review of the Non-Marine Mollusca of Great Britain: Species Status No. 17. NRW Evidence Report No: 14, 84pp, Natural Resources Wales, Bangor. M.B. Seddon, I.J. Killeen & A.P. Fowles. March 2014
designations.reporting_category: Red listing based on 2001 IUCN guidelines
designations.designation_description: A taxon that occurs in the region but has been excluded from the regional Red List for a specific reason
